quiz_item.error_analysis: 学生易因词根"ana-"(再次)+"-phora"(携带)误猜为"再次传递"，或因形近词"aphorism"(格言)误解为"简短警句"
quiz_item.sentence: In the sentence "Mary forgot her umbrella, so she had to walk home in the rain," the pronoun "she" is a classic example of **anaphora**, as it refers back to "Mary."
